Posts.Content: Thanks for sharing. It's always great to hear positive stories x
Posts.Title: Positive news

Posts.Content: I had a very sore crusty nose on docetaxol. It turned out to be an infection and I had to get antibiotics for it. It was agony though so yours hopefully isn't infected. The doctor can prescribe a cream for up your nose. I think it's called naseptin. It should really help. Best wishes Sara xx
Posts.Title: Sore nose
